PrimaryTransport.TransportTypeData:
<CustomProps>
  <MaxReceivedMessageSize vt="3">65536</MaxReceivedMessageSize>
  <MessageEncoding vt="8">Text</MessageEncoding>
  <TextEncoding vt="8">utf-8</TextEncoding>
  <SecurityMode vt="8">Transport</SecurityMode>
  <MessageClientCredentialType vt="8">UserName</MessageClientCredentialType>
  <AlgorithmSuite vt="8">Basic256</AlgorithmSuite>
  <TransportClientCredentialType vt="8">None</TransportClientCredentialType>
  <UseSSO vt="11">0</UseSSO>
  <ProxyToUse vt="8">Default</ProxyToUse>
  <StaticAction vt="8"><BtsActionMapping xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <Operation Name="login" Action="" />
  <Operation Name="describeSObject" Action="" />

  <Operation Name="describeTabs" Action="" />

  <Operation Name="merge" Action="" />
  <Operation Name="delete" Action="" />

  <Operation Name="emptyRecycleBin" Action="" />

  <Operation Name="getUserInfo" Action="" />

  <Operation Name="describeAvailableQuickActions" Action="" />
  <Operation Name="retrieveQuickActionTemplates" Action="" />
  <Operation Name="describeNouns" Action="" />
</BtsActionMapping></StaticAction>
  <InboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</InboundBodyLocation>
  <InboundNodeEncoding vt="8">Xml</InboundNodeEncoding>
  <OutboundBodyLocation vt="8">UseBodyElement</OutboundBodyLocation>
  <OutboundXmlTemplate vt="8"><bts-msg-body xmlns="http://www.microsoft.com/schemas/bts2007" encoding="xml"/></OutboundXmlTemplate>
  <PropagateFaultMessage vt="11">-1</PropagateFaultMessage>
  <OpenTimeout vt="8">00:01:00</OpenTimeout>
  <SendTimeout vt="8">00:01:00</SendTimeout>
  <CloseTimeout vt="8">00:01:00</CloseTimeout>
</CustomProps>
